subject: Track and Field
Robberies and Thefts
Prostheses
Paralympic Games
lead_paragraph: Ranjit Steiner, a leading American amputee sprinter, has been sidelined from training after his $30,000 prosthetic running leg was stolen.
snippet: Ranjit Steiner, a leading American amputee sprinter, has been sidelined from training after his $30,000 prosthetic running leg was stolen.
